name: kickball
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a game played especially by children that is similar to baseball but is played with a large ball that is kicked instead of being hit with a bat: As kids, we used to play kickball a lot. Round up the neighborhood for a game of softball or kickball.
More examplesFewer examplesIt reminded me of a group of kids waiting to get picked for a kickball team.Kickball on the schoolyard tended to leave you with bruises.Adult co-ed kickball has organized roots going back to at least 1998.
